rdf:Description.dc:title: Characterization of oil sand resources 1988
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Wallace, David, 1937-
Alberta Oil Sands Technology and Research Authority.
U.S.-Canada Cooperative Agreement on Tar Sand and Heavy Oil.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton : Alberta Oil Sands Technology and Research Authority,
rdf:Description.dc:description: "Report on the activities concerning Annex 1 of the U.S.-Canada Cooperative Agreement on Tar Sand and Heavy Oil."

Summarizes and discusses the efforts by United States and Canadian analytical laboratory researchers to develop a technical basis for reliable, comparable measurement of physical and chemical properties of oil (tar) sands.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Oil sands.
Petroleum
